author: Associated Press
title: Thousands protest Wisconsin sheriff's immigration crackdown | Daily Mail Online
text: DON'T MISS Jeremy Kyle, 51, can't keep his eyes off his children's former nanny Vicky Burton, 35, as she relaxes on Barbados break... after romance revelation Tom Cruise's mother Mary Lee dies in her sleep at age 80 and is remembered with Scientology service Devastating news for the star 'I'm nothing without you': Blue's Simon Webbe pops the question to girlfriend Ayshen Kemal in Jamaican proposal Certainly not feeling blue 'If I died now, Pete would get everything': Katie Price reveals she hasn't changed her will since splitting from Andre... despite tying the knot twice since Beaming Danielle Lloyd steps out in wake of pregnancy news after admitting she didn't tell ex Jamie O'Hara due to CBB antics Baby on the way Shia LaBeouf's ex Sasha Lane bares A LOT of side-boob as she goes braless in very daring blazer dress at the ELLE Style Awards One Elle of an eyeful Arizona Muse stuns in a plunging silk slip while Iskra Lawrence rocks an edgy black minidress as the stunning models lead the glamour at the ELLE Style Awards All hail the queen of rock 'n' roll! Rebellious Blondie star Debbie Harry, 71, rules the red carpet as she dons a CROWN to London's ELLE Style Awards EXCLUSIVE 'They think I'm doing it for money': Iskra Lawrence flashes curves at ELLE Style Awards... as she reveals criticism of her confidence crusade Don't train on her parade! Thandie Newton is left struggling with her flowing black gown as she makes elegant arrival at ELLE Style Awards 'Love hurts': Heartbroken Bella Hadid breaks her silence on her 'hard' split from The Weeknd as she graces Teen Vogue Singer later hooked up with Selena Gomez 'Happy Valentine's Eve to me, love from me: Scarlett Moffatt toasts single life with champagne in glam Instagram... weeks after split from Luke Crodden Kate's back on track: The Duchess of Cambridge joins Princes William and Harry in London Marathon show hosted by Nick Knowles PICTURE EXCLUSIVE: Gail Porter enjoys a leisurely lunch with friends after revealing bankruptcy woes and admitting she was homeless Making a splash! Lady Victoria Hervey cuts an eye catching figure as she braves the LA drizzle in black underwear and mesh bodysuit Surf's up! Shirtless Liam Hemsworth shows off his buff body as he hits the waves in the cold and blustery Malibu weather Miley's a lucky girl! Not quite the cowgirl! Kendall Jenner STANDS on top of a horse for a strange new Vogue magazine photoshoot Horsing around Off to see her beau! Khloe Kardashian flaunts her derriere as she catches flight to meet up with Valentine's Day date Tristan Thompson 'Are you mad coz I got drunk?': Chrissy Teigen shares hilarious Snapchat as she falls to the floor in front of John Legend following wild night out at Grammys An injury won't Drag Him Down: Harry Styles sports painful-looking wrist bandage as he steps out in London... ahead of his solo album Pregnant Marion Cotillard shows off her baby bump in a lacy Gothic top as she joins husband Guillaume Canet at premiere of their film Rock'n'Roll MIC's Jessica Woodley displays her enviably toned abs in series of VERY skimpy bikinis during sun-soaked Mexican holiday Kanye West looks serious as he heads to Yeezy showroom in NYC... after friend revealed the rapper suffered memory loss following breakdown Lilo takes NY! Lindsay Lohan struts around in black leather leggings while sporting $3.5K Gucci jacket and $1,850 bag after return to the US Fans wig out over Kylie Jenner! Teen queen wears orange hair and nude mini-dress to greet thousands of fans at her NYC pop-up shop 'What the f**k does she need to do to win?': Adele breaks her Album Of The Year Grammy in half to share with Beyoncé after moving the singer to tears Love Island's Olivia Buckland flaunts her enviable hourglass figure as she treats herself to non-surgical makeover for Valentine's Day Sam Taylor-Johnson, 49, cuddles up to handsome husband Aaron, 26, as they join Tom Ford to jet back to LA after the BAFTAs 'Wiz and I are family' Amber opens up about her kiss with ex Khalifa while sharing new details about her split from dancer Val Chmerkovskiy Bathing beauty! Jessica Alba flaunts her toned body in bikini as she takes a break from running Honest Company to lounge in Mexico Pregnant Beyonce debuts her baby bump as she slays with stunning performance at the Grammy Awards She's expecting twins and rave reviews. Stumblin' In! Rocker Suzi Quatro, 66, wears jeans and a leather jacket as she arrives at Perth Airport with husband Rainer Haas ahead of her Australian tour 'I'll be cooking and looking sexy': Khloe Kardashian reveals Valentine's Day plans with beau Tristan as she flashes bra on The Ellen Show Kourtney Kardashian looks sensational in a thigh-skimming LBD as she hits Grammys after-party in LA Made a splash in her racy number Katie Price battles with the wind as she visits a beauty salon... after confessing she hasn't changed will since Peter Andre divorce 'All I want': Leigh-Anne Pinnock shares smitten bed selfie as she snuggles up to tattooed footballer beau Andre Gray Now THAT's a little black dress! Braless Keke Palmer leaves little to the imagination as she hits Grammy afterparty in extremely low cut frock The big unVEILing: Danielle Lloyd confirms she is expecting her fourth child by emulating singer Beyoncé's iconic pregnancy snap in photo shoot Night Fever! John Travolta, 62, shows he's still got the moves as he hits the dancefloor with Lady Gaga at Interscope Grammys afterparty 'I burst into an ugly cry': Camila Cabello was so touched by support from fans after leaving Fifth Harmony she broke down in tears EXCLUSIVE: Oh Baby! Candy Spelling throws over-the-top $40,000 baby shower for daughter Tori who is expecting a boy with Dean McDermott Kristin Scott Thomas, 56, and Patricia Clarkson, 57, exude elegance in velvet gowns at The Party Berlinale Film Festival premiere 'I'm not ready... and he's still married': Bethenny Frankel, 46, reveals she isn't serious with Dennis Shields and he's not her Valentine date All that glitters! Bella Hadid sparkles on the catwalk for Carolina Herrera at New York Fashion Week The 20-year-old stunned yet again at the Carolina Herrera show He's Too Good! Drake laps up rapturous applause from fans as he celebrates double Grammy win at a packed nightclub in Manchester Love Island's Katie Salmon shows off eye-popping assets in lingerie as she puckers up to Emma Jane Woodhams for shoot Stephen Bear puts romance with Charlotte Crosby to one side as he indulges in a kiss with raven haired beauty on Celebs Go Dating Fashionista friends! Emmy Rossum and Christina Ricci hit the front row for the Carolina Herrera show at NYFW Should I give up or am I just erasing statements? Adele's 'A' tattoo tribute to son Angelo appears faded at the Grammys... or is it down to make-up? Queen Meghan! Photos of Prince Harry's girlfriend as a teenager show she was homecoming royalty and already a budding star in school plays Here come the divas! Jennifer Lopez, Adele and Rihanna lead best dressed at the 59th annual Grammy Awards Pop divas united on the red carpet Rihanna joins The Weeknd and his camera-shy plus one Selena Gomez as they arrive at star-studded Grammys afterparty at 1Oak What Grammys? Selena Gomez shrugs off awards show to sing karaoke with The Weeknd at Rihanna's party Didn't score a nod Adriana Lima flashes her decolletage and endless long legs in skin-tight black leather mini-dress at New York Fashion Week bash Orlando Bloom relaxes at Malibu's Soho House... while Katy Perry parties the night away at the Grammys Evening away from the songstress Stranger Things release thrilling new stills from highly-awaited second series as Will grasps to adapt to life outside the Upside Down She's glowing: Whitney Port conceals barely-there baby bump under shiny silver top at New York Fashion Week Announced her pregnancy last week Naomie Harris reveals her role in Moonlight helped her 'grow as a person' as she expresses her shock at being cast as a crack addict Always in a bikini! Alessandra Ambrosio flashes a peace sign as she enjoys a cocktail while in a swimming pool Looking flawless Flashing her tummy! Victoria Justice shows off toned body in crop top as she dances at Red Light Management Grammy after party Out and a pout: Rumer Willis shows off her plump lips as she hits up Grammy celebrations with sister Scout The 28-year-old started her evening at Chateau Marmont Awkward! I Took A Pill In Ibiza singer Mike Posner, 29, tells Giuliana Rancic, 42, he wants to MARRY her during bizarre Grammy interview A kiss hello! Robin Thicke, 39, smooches girlfriend April, 22, when she picks him up at LA airport... as his custody dispute continues Warm welcome Debbie Reynolds' Hollywood dance studio will be converted into museum to show off her costumes from Singin' In The Rain and Molly Brown From Downton to Disney! Michelle Dockery and Laura Carmichael clad themselves in mouse ears for fun day out at theme park in LA 'For all the lovers out there!' MIC's Louise Thompson shows off her athletic physique as she prepares for first Valentine's Day with beau Ryan Libbey Blue-ing them away! Elizabeth Hurley, 51, looks regally glamorous in royal blue dress as she flaunts her fab figure at design fair Jeremy McConnell enjoys a drink in Dublin after announcing he's the father of Stephanie Davis' son... as his ex finally follows him back on Twitter Bethenny Frankel marvels at Kylie Jenner's '10K' fans at the opening of her NYC pop-up shop The 19-year-old make-up mogul Snapchatted: 'I love you guys!' Daddy cool: Gordon Ramsay holds hands with youngest daughter Tilly, 15, as they grab a family bite to eat at Soho House in Malibu Now it's time to dance! Emma Stone clutches her Best Actress gong while rival Amy Adams downs a commiserating champagne as stars flock to BAFTAs parties Colour clashing, ill-fitting stripes and garish prints: Caitriona Balfe, Edith Bowman and Heloise Letissier lead the stars who got it wrong at the BAFTAs Archers actress Sara Coward - who played unlucky-in-love Caroline for almost 40 years - dies of cancer at the age of 69 Peter Andre cradles baby Theo, three months, as he parties with his son at star-studded restaurant launch Wasted no time Vicky Pattison flaunts slim waist in sports bra and lycra leggings... after hitting back at social media haters who accused her of airbrushing Lauren Pope shows off her toned abs in sexy throwback swimwear snap as woeful star complains about being back in the office Could it be magic? Rare video of Take That performing at a school two years before they released their first album is set to sell for £10,000 Pregnant Rochelle Humes shows off her bump in a blush bardot dress as she celebrates her baby shower with WAG Georgina Cleverley Making a splash! Hannah Jeter posed for the new Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Edition just weeks after learning she was pregnant Bikini-clad Alexis Ren shows off her VERY peachy bottom as she poses for new bohemian swimwear range Sultry Californian model, 'Ain't playing!': Unbreakable Kimmy Schmidt's Tituss Burgess re-creates Beyonce's Lemonade music video for new trailer Pamela Anderson, 49, still enjoys doing saucy shoots as she reveals it's been 'a process' for her sons to adapt to her racy past Victoria's Secret angel Martha Hunt says models sleep on COTS at all-night fittings - and the stress almost made her quit before she made it big Best Actress Emma Stone joins Nicole Kidman and Amy Adams as Hollywood's finest mingle with Kate and Wills on the red carpet at the BAFTAs Duchess of Cambridge braves the cold in an off-the-shoulder Alexander McQueen gown as she and Prince William bring red carpet royalty to the BAFTAs William and Kate to make a poignant visit to Paris next month ahead of the 20th anniversary of Princess Diana's death in the city La La Land does a victory dance at the BAFTAs as it sweeps the board with FIVE prizes on the biggest night in British film Lead the winners Chantelle Houghton shows off her slim legs in spray-on leggings... after insisting that 'life is too short to worry about weight' in explosive TV row Karrueche Tran threatens to flash all in daring skirt and plunging crop top and she parties with glamorous BFF Christina Milian at GQ party Twitter users congratulate former Bachelorette star JoJo Fletcher on her Grammy win after confusing her with lookalike country singer Maren Morris Surf's up! Liam Hemsworth hits the waves with older brother Luke in the cold and blustery Malibu weather Cold and blustery weather Her little monster: Lady Gaga is pictured heading to the Interscope Grammys after party with her rumoured new boyfriend Christian Carino Not nice to meet Blue? Beyonce's daughter, five, steals the show in a $3k hot pink Gucci suit at Grammys... but doesn't seem too keen on host James Corden Paris Jackson calls her father Michael a 'legend' as she pays tribute to the late King of Pop onstage at the Grammy Awards A Scher-zinger of a look! Nicole displays MAJOR sideboob as she goes braless in mini dress while showcasing her plump pout at post-Grammys bash Chrissy Teigen flashes her cleavage in a plunging orange gown as she cuddles up to John Legend at GQ and Chance The Rapper's post-Grammys party Katy Perry flaunts her ample cleavage in plunging split-leg jumpsuit for Universal Grammy after-party Jet black to bottle blonde Corrie's Mikey North reveals he secretly welcomed son Archie three months ago with new wife Rachael... after her 'traumatic chainsaw massacre' birth Rock and roll royal! Queen Letizia shows off her slender figure in skin-tight leather skirt as she joins husband King Felipe for a conference in Madrid Catherine Zeta Jones, 47, shows off her svelte figure in form-fitting one-shoulder dress as she attends photocall for new television series Feud 'The guests were off their faces': Martin Kemp reveals his wedding cake was laced with CANNABIS... and his rocker pals queued up for seconds You've got to be kitten me! Braless Bella Thorne dons quirky cat ears and pink skinny jeans as she opts for a low-key look at GQ post-Grammys party A £1,800 handbag for Harper... as well as £550 Burberry trench coats for Romeo and Cruz... it's a good job brand Beckham is worth '£240million' Pregnant Rosie Huntington-Whiteley hides her bump in boho jacket as she heads out with Jason Statham in Malibu... First child Jourdan Dunn looks leggy in a powder blue mini as she joins pretty in pink Emily Ratajkowski at Diane von Furstenberg NYFW dinner Pictured: Damage Mischa Barton caused after slamming a moving truck into her new apartment building...after she was filmed having 'meltdown' What shade is that? Twitter goes wild as Rihanna is seen applying her lipgloss after she misses out on Grammy to Beyonce Not paying attention Sheer luxe! Heidi Klum displays her enviable hourglass figure in daring leather pannelled dress at Republic Records Grammys after-party Raising eyebrows on the red carpet: Rita Ora continues to show off her VERY different look as she attends post-Grammys bash Had a makeover? Adele confirms marriage to Simon Konecki as she thanks her 'husband' in emotional Grammys speech...but slams her estranged father 'I'm sorry, I can't mess this up for him': Tearful Adele stops Grammy Awards tribute to George Michael mid-song after swearing before starting over The look that says I slayed! Pregnant Beyonce squeezes her bump into a skintight red dress as she joins Jay Z after stunning Grammys performance Night on the Toon! Geordie Shore's Charlotte Crosby flashes her legs in thigh-skimming skirt as she steps out with Holly Hagan and Kyle Christie 'She said George and Charlotte are competitive!' Paula Radcliffe says Kate revealed her children's sibling rivalry when they swapped stories Madonna and son Rocco's custody feud 'put the singer's plans to adopt Malawian twins Stella and Esther at risk' Had to resolve her custody dispute with son 'She's no Ken Bruce!' Radio 2 listeners blast Fearne Cotton on Twitter for 'racing through' their beloved Popmaster quiz It's a hard audience to impress Miley Cyrus shows off her slim pins in tiny shorts as she skips Grammys in favour of running errands in Malibu James Corden and Will Smith take to the skies in a helicopter... as Ariana Grande and a host of other celebs join him in exciting Carpool Karaoke trailer Burberry 'apologise unreservedly' after mixing up BAFTA winner Dev Patel with rapper Riz Ahmed in embarrassing Twitter gaffe 'Oh god!' Emma Stone rolls her eyes after presenter Zoe Ball asks if she has a winner's speech prepared during strained interview at BAFTAs 'Only a blithering idiot would think she's not the greatest actress': Meryl Streep plants a huge kiss on BAFTAs host Stephen Fry as he takes swipe at Donald Trump Peek-a-boob! Braless Lady Gaga flashes flesh and new body art in outrageous crop-top and kinky boots on Grammy Awards red carpet It was a racy look Feeling fur-tastic! Iggy Azalea dons blue fur jacket and red velvet hot pants as she attends the Def Jam Toasts The Grammys event David Bowie sweeps the board with FIVE posthumous gongs for final album Blackstar at the Grammy Awards Never triumphed during his lifetime Sickening sparkles, a dress drenched in CDs and a human BALL PIT: Stars do their best to shock and horrify on the Grammy Awards red carpet 'This is a disaster!' James Corden 'fakes' technical glitch and brings the house down in slapstick start to the Grammys Flustered, he fooled all 'I think it's time for another shot!' Rihanna shamelessly knocks back booze from her bedazzled flask during Grammy Awards ceremony Heavily pregnant Ciara puts her baby bump on display in tight top and striped jacket as she cosies up to husband Russell Wilson at the Warner Grammys party Metallica's duet with crowd-surfing Lady Gaga goes awry when James Hetfield's mic fails... as the Grammys are plagued with technical difficulties 'Sorry!': Laverne Cox is forced to apologize after failing to name Metallica in Grammy introduction (but she remembered Lady Gaga) 'I have so much love for that boy': Jennifer Lopez gushes about her fling Drake while walking the Grammy Awards red carpet She dated Drake briefly Dirty dancing! Chrissy Teigen stuns in edgy cutout as she grinds against husband John Legend in a racy red carpet appearance at the Grammys 'I'm sh**ting myself!' Kerry Katona overcomes her fear to climb the Sydney Harbour Bridge ALONE after her Atomic Kitten bandmates drop out Back to business! Prince William resumes his royal duties by launching the new Centrepoint helpline after a star-studded night at the BAFTAs Harper Beckham clasps onto dad David's hand as he and the rest of the clan venture back to London from NYC in light of backlash from leaked email scandal 'I'm a very optimistic person', says Posh: Victoria Beckham claims she is looking forward to the future in her first interview since David's email scandal The sidewalk is their catwalk! Model BFFs Kendall Jenner and Hailey Baldwin take a break from New York Fashion Week to enjoy girly lunch 'I've seen her nipples more than my own!' Lena Dunham goes fully nude AGAIN in explicit sex scene as she gets mixed reviews for Girls' season 6 debut 'I will never feel uncomfortable about such a natural act!': Tamara Ecclestone continues to defend breastfeeding daughter Sophia at almost three Kylie Minogue's family gave pop star a Christmas ultimatum to choose Joshua Sasse or them after sister Dannii 'found out some home truths about actor' Cheeky Charlotte McKinney shows off her toned legs in TINY denim cut-offs as she enjoys a relaxed day out with friends in Malibu Blonde bombshell PICTURE EXCLUSIVE: Great at 48! Jennifer Aniston flaunts bikini body during birthday trip to Mexico with a VERY toned Justin Theroux A well-earned break She's hit a purple patch! Diane Kruger puts on another stylish front row display in elegant lilac evening dress at Prabal Gurung's NYFW show PICTURE EXCLUSIVE: Courteney Cox, 52, is toned in black bikini as she takes Johnny McDaid to Jennifer Aniston's 48th birthday bash in Mexico 'We all have friends of different races, but to separate them is insidious': Adele faces backlash for thanking Beyonce for inspiring 'her black friends' Ellen DeGeneres leads fans rushing to support Adele online after songstress flubbed her George Michael tribute and asked the Grammys to start again 'His memory is coming back': Kanye West's collaborator Malik Yusef reveals rapper still has issues following 'psychotic breakdown' 'This is to my wife': Emotional Rory Feek dedicates his Grammy win to late partner Joey with heartfelt speech a year after her death from cancer 'Sorry mom and dad!': Katy Perry drops curse word on live TV before 'throwing shade' at Britney (and her wild silver outfit shocks too!) Daughter of a preacher Double take! Charli XCX turns heads in underwear at Grammy after party (but it's just an optical illusion dress) She's known for her over-the-top outfits Emerald goddess! Celine Dion flashes flesh in plunging Zuhair Murad gown at Grammy Awards Plunging neckline and thigh-high slit 'No hate!' Katy Perry gets political with elaborate fenced-in performance of her new single Chained To The Rhythm at the Grammys His leading lady! Jamie Dornan looks dapper in a sharp tuxedo as he cosies up to his stunning wife Amelia Warner at the BAFTAs One lucky lady! 'Regretful' Ryan Gosling unable to attend the BAFTAs due to 'family matter'... as La La Land scoops five awards He was nominated Bee Gees' surviving member Barry Gibb gives Demi Lovato and others standing ovation for Grammy tribute Little Big Town, Andra Day, and Tori Kelly She's back and better than ever! Adele rectifies last year's Grammy sound glitch with blistering opening song... and ends with a shout-out to her son Solange shares Frank Ocean's rant against 'cultural bias' at the Grammys... moments after Adele pips Beyonce to win Album Of The Year She's got some front! Katharine McPhee displays her cleavage in low cut dress on Grammy Awards red carpet She's been laying low Stunning in stripes! Alicia Keys wows in low cut gold and black jumpsuit for her Grammy Awards performance Twenty One Pilots accept Best Pop Group Performance Grammy in their underwear... before explaining why in sweet speech 'Dad what are you doing?' James Corden brings parents to Grammys only for them to pair up with celebrity dates Heidi Klum and Nick Jonas Busta Rhymes calls Trump 'President Agent Orange' and kicks down a 'wall' as Beyonce and JLo take aim at the new administration during the Grammys 'I can't believe you slept with my wife!' Stanley Tucci jokes with sister-in-law Emily Blunt as they present award together at the star-studded BAFTAs FKA Twigs puts on a typically kooky display in utility look while Naomi Campbell flashes her underwear as they join BAFTA festivities at Weinstein after-party She's a long way from Chester: Former Hollyoaks star Elize Du Toit wears emerald green gown as she accompanies husband Rafe Spall to BAFTAs Can't take my eyes off Hugh! Actor Grant, 56, gazes lovingly at his girlfriend Anna Eberstein, 34, as they step out in style for the BAFTAs Sophie Turner comes dangerously close to a wardrobe malfunction in a VERY plunging metallic gown with a perilously high side split at the BAFTAs Golden girl! Solange glimmers in pleated frock and wins first Grammy for best R&B performance 'Show your sexy side': Demi Lovato in keyhole cutout gown leaves little to the imagination at Grammy Awards Put on an eye-popping display She's a human disco ball! Heidi Klum glitters in silver mesh mini dress at Grammy Awards in Los Angeles The 43-year-old model looked amazing 'Chris gave Marta a real talking-to': Hemsworth told Spanish actress Milans to stay away from scandals amid rumours she's at the centre of popstar's split with Joshua Sasse Britney Spears soaks up the sun in bikini snap while skipping the Grammys as her fans lash out at Katy Perry for 'mental health' jab Stealing the limelight! Emily Ratajkowski, Alexa Chung and Christina Ricci stun as they sit front row at Altuzarra NYFW show Kanye West heads out in rainy NYC as Grammys take place in LA... after mom-in-law Kris Jenner said he opted to focus on upcoming Yeezy 5 show Starving for sushi! Justin Bieber skips Grammy Awards despite his four nods and dines on Asian cuisine instead Adele hints at support for her Album Of The Year rival Beyonce with Lemonade brooch... as she joins sizzling Charli XCX in leading British glamour at Grammys 'Reclusive' singer Enya emerges from her solitary lifestyle in a castle to attend the Grammy Awards in an ivory embellished gown That's a surprise Dedicated wife Julia Carey shows her support for Grammy host James Corden as she carries clutch bag embellished with his name Paris Jackson shines bright in rhinestone rainbow Balmain jumpsuit as she returns to the Grammy Awards The rising starlet rocked a wild 'do Ravishing in red! Carrie Underwood shows off cleavage in sequined gown with cutout at chest on Grammy Awards red carpet Camila Cabello makes her solo red carpet debut at the Grammys... two months after leaving Fifth Harmony Rocked a beaded choker with her lavender gown Bra-vo! Kristin Cavallari goes braless as she flaunts her ample bosom in plunging gown at Grammy Awards Showstopping grand entrance 'I thought he was having a heart attack!': Texas singer Sharleen Spiteri announces her engagement to chef beau Bryn Williams... after 10 YEARS 'MetalliGa!' Lady Gaga shows off huge 'tattoo' inspired by Metallica's Moth Into Flame ahead of Grammys duet Revealed the inking, which may be temporary 'No bad energy': Meghan Markle returns to Instagram after two-month hiatus with message 'sending good vibes' to her followers Remarkably low profile 'I'm getting a bit sick of it...' Bikini-clad Vicky Pattison shares defiant video clip in bid to expel Photoshop claims... as she 'airbrushes' snaps Branded 'embarrassing' Sam Taylor-Johnson, 49, dazzles in a low-cut gown as she supports husband Aaron, 26, on the BAFTAs red carpet with high hopes for his nomination Going for gold! Penelope Cruz channels Seventies chic in a metallic gown and matching platforms as she attends the BAFTAs Dressed to impress That's why the lady is a VAMP! Thandie Newton is glamorously gothic in very sexy plunging strapless gown and dark lipstick as she arrives at the BAFTAs The Girl With The Train! Best Actress nominee Emily Blunt dazzles in an eye-catching ruffled black gown as she joins John Krasinski at the BAFTAs Girl of the moment Victoria Beckham gives fans something extra to look at as she steps out in a sheer blue skirt after NYFW show... amid David's email scandal Amy Adams looks spellbinding in a strapless emerald column gown with a sexy open back as she dazzles on the BAFTA red carpet Hannah Redmayne cuts an elegant figure in floor-length black floral gown as she joins dapper husband Eddie on the BAFTA red carpet Stone cold stunner: La La Land's leading lady Emma looks exquisite in a super-plunging silver dress and pointed heels for the BAFTAs Dressed for success Kandi Burruss denies being lesbian and Kenya Moore endures insults during RHOA camping getaway 'We dodged a bullet': Dragon's Den star Sarah Willingham reveals husband's cancer scare forced her to leave Dragon's Den to be around for him Jeremy McConnell 'has not met son Caben-Albi'... despite sharing sweet snap of the newborn as he confirmed he is the father 'Happy 1st Birthday to Our Princess Penelope Blu!' Cara Kilbey celebrates daughter's special day... as boyfriend Daniel Harris' drugs trial continues She's eclectic! Gigi Hadid dons patchwork fur, leather pants and blue shades as she enjoys dinner with rarely seen sister Alana Low key dinner Dream in cream! Bella Hadid leaves little to the imagination in sheer top and shiny gold pants at Sies Marjan NYFW show Victoria's Secret model showcased her figure Strike in stilettos? Mariah Carey dons metallic heels and mini-skirt to bowl in her home Spent Grammy Sunday demonstrating her sporty skills Before the big show: Celine Dion wears floral gown as she departs private jet while on her way to Grammys... as Gaga hangs with Metallica SHARE PICTURE
